General.Name: GlobalWafers Co Ltd
General.Description: GlobalWafers Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, and manufactures semiconductor ingots and wafers in Taiwan and internationally. It offers silicon ingots; and annealed, diffusion, epitaxial, compound, polished, and SOI wafers. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. GlobalWafers Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Sino-American Silicon Products Inc.
General.Address: Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
